short.es: Menú Contextual para servidores de Xinet
short.fr: Menu contextuel pour les serveurs Xinet
short.ja: Xinetコンテキストメニュー

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Increase productivity in design studios by providing quick access to assets for fast, last minute changes. This Xinet Browser plug-in adds new options to your contextual menu to help users quickly locate files for last minute touch-ups. By simply right-clicking on an asset preview in Xinet Portal new contextual menu options enable Xinet users to open or reveal the location of any asset on the server, without navigating through the volume. Don’t waste time searching—find your assets fast with Contextual Menu.
